content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[SingleTable]
(
    id nvarchar(10),
	first_name nvarchar(20),
    last_name nvarchar(20),
    email nvarchar(30),
    gender nvarchar(20),
    ip_address nvarchar(20),
    year nvarchar(4)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
